channel.title: Macchiato Monsters: Witchburner
channel.description:
Just got on the forum so I'm posting my game! Witchburner is a tabletop RPG adventure that takes an intimate, claustrophobic delve into a small town beset by witchcraft. It deals with the topics you would expect with a title like Witchburner: magic, suspicion, fear, torture, fire, people burning.
It casts the heroes in the role of witchfinders—whether witting or unwitting—whom the town of Bridge expects to find the witch threatening their town and burn her.
Macchiato Monsters is an adaptation of the Black Hack with the classes and magic system from the White Hack. Hopefully this will allow people to continue using their characters from the Longwinter game here! It takes place in the same world.
